description.full: Madden NFL 13 is all-new from boot up to credits.  Every mode, every screen, every pixel has been reinvented delivering the most innovative, connected, and authentic Madden NFL experience in franchise history.
description.short: Madden NFL 13 is all-new from boot up to credits.  Every mode, every screen, every pixel has been reinvented delivering the most innovative, connected, and authentic Madden NFL experience in franchise history.
